response.overview: Danielle de Niese presents Mozart’s choral masterpiece, performed specially for a lockdown television audience by the chorus and orchestra of the English National Opera and a stellar line-up of soloists - Elizabeth Llewellyn, Dame Sarah Connolly, Ed Lyon and Gerald Finley. On stage at the Coliseum in London, Mark Wigglesworth conducts the emotionally charged Requiem - unfinished at the time of the composer’s death - in what promises to be a poignant moment of remembrance, reflection and ultimately hope at a time of national crisis.
response.title: Mozart's Requiem from ENO
